contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Australian place | type = lga | name = Glamorgan Spring Bay Council | state = Tasmania | image = LGATasmania_Glamorgan.png | caption = Glamorgan Spring Bay Council | pop = {{formatnum:4507}} | pop_footnotes = <ref name=ABS3218.0>{{cite web|url=http://www.abs.gov.au/AUSSTATS/abs@.nsf/DetailsPage/3218.02009-10?OpenDocument|title=3218.0 - Regional Population Growth, Australia, 2009-10|publisher=Australian Bureau of Statistics|date=31 March 2011|accessdate=23 August 2011}} Estimated resident population (ERP) at 30 June 2010.</ref> | area = 2522 | est = | seat = [[Swansea, Tasmania|Swansea]] | mayor = Bertrand Cadart | region = Southern [[East Coast, Tasmania|East coast]] | logo = | url = http://www.gsbc.tas.gov.au | stategov = [[Division of Lyons (state)|Lyons]] | fedgov = [[Division of Lyons|Lyons]] | near-nw = [[Northern Midlands]] | near-n = [[Break O'Day]] | near-ne = ''[[Tasman Sea]]'' | near-w = [[Northern Midlands]] | near-e = ''[[Tasman Sea]]'' | near-sw = [[Southern Midlands Council|Southern Midlands]] | near-s = [[Sorell Council|Sorell]] | near-se = ''[[Tasman Sea]]'' | coordinates = {{coord|42|15|36|S|147|58|12|E|type:adm2nd_source:GA_region:AU-TAS|display=inline,title}} }} The '''Glamorgan Spring Bay Council''' or '''Municipality of Glamorgan Spring Bay''' covers the southern east coast of [[Tasmania]], [[Australia]]. It includes the towns of [[Swansea, Tasmania|Swansea]], [[Orford, Tasmania|Orford]], [[Triabunna, Tasmania|Triabunna]] and [[Coles Bay, Tasmania|Coles Bay]], as well as the national parks at [[Maria Island]] and the [[Freycinet Peninsula]]. The council gets its name from the region of [[Glamorgan]] in [[Wales]]. ==References== <references /> ==External links== *[http://www.gsbc.tas.gov.au Glamorgan Spring Bay Council] *[http://www.orfordtriabunnacc.com.au Orford/Triabunna Region Chamber of Commerce] [[Category:Local Government Areas of Tasmania]] [[Category:East Coast Tasmania]] {{Tasmania-geo-stub}}
